column3: aber a Jerusalɛmhen Adoni-zedek tsee mbrɛ Josua sii gyee Ai
column4: na ɔsɛɛ no pasapasa; dɛ mbrɛ ɔdze yɛɛ Jeriko nye ne hen no
column5: dɛmara so na ɔdze yɛɛ Ai nye ne hen; na mbrɛ Gibeonfo sii nye Israel siesiei

column3: osiandɛ Gibeon yɛ kurow kɛse
column4: ɔtse dɛ ahenkurow no bi
column6: na no mu mbanyin nyinara yɛ ahoɔdzenfo."

column2: "Dɛm ntsi Jerusalɛmhen Adoni-zedek somae ma wɔkɔr Hebronhen Hoham
column3: Jarmuthen Piram
column4: Lakishen Jafia
column9: ma yenku Gibeon: osiandɛ ɔnye Josua na Israelmba no akɛyɛ asomdwee apam."

column2: "Dɛm ntsi Amorifo ahemfo beenum a hɔn nye
column3: Jerusalɛmhen
column4: Hebronhen

column2: "Na Gibeonfo no somae ma wɔkɔr Josua nkyɛn wɔ nsera mu wɔ Gilgal
column3: dɛ
column4: Mma nnyi wo nsa mmfi wo nkowaa do; bra hɛn nkyɛn ntsɛm bɛgye hɛn nkwa
column5: na bɔboa hɛn: na Amorifo ahemfo a wɔtsetse nkokodo nkurow mu nyinara apon hɔnho ehyia abɛhyɛ hɛn do."

column3: ɔnoara
column4: ɔnye akofo a wɔwɔ ne nkyɛn nyinara
column5: nye mbarimba akatakyi a wɔyɛ ndam nyinara."

column3: Mma nnsuro hɔn: na meyi hɔn ahyɛ wo nsa; hɔn mu nyimpa biara nnkegyina w'enyim."

column2: "Dɛm ntsi Josua baa hɔn do awerɛfir mu; osiandɛ ɔdze anadwe no nyinara fowee fi Gilgal kɔree."
"Na EWURADZE kaa hɔn gui wɔ Israel enyim
column3: na ɔdze okum kɛse kunkum hɔn wɔ Gibeon
column4: na wotsiiw hɔn wɔ Bɛt-horon n'afowee ɔkwan no do

column3: woruguan efi Israel enyim
column4: na wɔwɔ Bɛt-horon esianee no
column5: EWURADZE totoow abo akɛse fi sor bobɔɔ hɔn dze kodur Azeka
column6: ma wowuwui: hɔn a wɔdze ɔsorbo no kunkum hɔn no dɔɔ so sen hɔn a Israelmba no dze afona kunkum hɔn."

column2: "Nna Josua kasaa kyerɛɛ EWURADZE wɔ da a EWURADZE yii Amorifo mae wɔ Israelmba enyim no na ɔsee dɛ
column3: Iwi
column4: gyina dzinn wɔ Gibeon do; Na ɔwo

column3: na bosoom siankae
column4: Kodur dɛ ɔman no tɔɔ hɔn atamfo do wer. Ana wɔnnkyerɛɛw iyi wɔ Jasar nwoma no mu? Na wi siankae wɔ sor finimfin
column5: na ɔannyɛ ntsɛm annkɔtɔ bɛyɛ adzekyeekwansin mu."

column2: "Na da biara nnyi hɔ a ɔtse dɛ iyi da
column3: dɛ abɛsen anaa dza ɔbɛba a EWURADZE etsie nyimpa ne ndze dɛm: na EWURADZE koe maa Israel."
na Israel nyinara ka no ho
column4: baa nseraban no mu wɔ Gilgal."

column3: na wɔdze hɔnho kosumaa Makeda ɔbo tu no mu."
Ahemfo beenum no woehu hɔn dɛ wosuma Makeda ɔbo tu no mu."
Hom mpirew abo akɛse nhin ɔbo tu no ano
column4: na wɔmfa nyimpa ngyina ho ma wɔnweɔn hɔn:"

column2: "na hom dze mma wonnsianka; hom ntsiw hom atamfo no
column3: na wonku hɔn mu edziekyifo no
column4: mma hom mma hɔn kwan ma wɔnnkɛhɛn nkurow mu: osiandɛ EWURADZE hom Nyankopɔn eyi hɔn ahyɛ hom nsa."

column3: aber a Josua nye Israelmba no dze okum kɛse pɔtɔɔ wiee hɔn kunkum araa ma wɔhyewee no
column4: na hɔn mu nkaa a wɔkae no guanguanee kɛhɛnhɛɛn nkurow a wɔagyegye ho ban no mu no
column6: "nna ɔman no nyinara sanee baa Josua nkyɛn wɔ nseraban no mu wɔ Makeda dwudwoodwo: na obi anntwe ne gyirama annka Israelmba mu obiara da."

column3: Hom mbue ɔbo tu no ano
column4: na hom nyi ahemfo beenum no mfi ɔbo tu no mu mbrɛ me."

column3: na woyii ahemfo beenum no fii ɔbo tu no mu brɛɛ no
column4: Jerusalɛm

column3: aber a wɔdze ahemfo no brɛɛ Josua no
column4: Josua kɛfrɛɛ Israel mbarimba nyinara
column5: na ɔsee mbarimba akofo a wɔnye no kɔree no hɔn asafohemfo no dɛ
column7: mfa hom anan mbesisi hɔn kɔn do."

column3: Mma hom nnsuro
column4: mma hom abaw mu nntu so; hom nhyɛ dzen na wonnya akokodur: na dɛm na EWURADZE bɛyɛ hom atamfo a hom nye hɔn ko nyinara."

column2: "Na n'ekyir no Josua bobɔɔ hɔn kunkum hɔn
column3: na ɔdze hɔn sensɛɛn ndua do: na wɔsensɛɛn ndua no do araa kodur ewimbir."
Josua hyɛe ma woyiyii hɔn fii ndua no do
column4: na wɔkɔtoow hɔn guu ɔbo tu no a wɔdze hɔnho kosumaa mu no mu
column5: na wɔdze abo akɛse hiin ɔbo tu no ano
column6: dze bodu ndɛ da yi ara."

column2: "Na Josua gyee Makeda da no ara
column3: na ɔdze afona bɔɔ kurow no
column4: nye ne hen no; na ɔsɛɛ hɔn nyinara nye akra a wɔwɔ mu no pasapasa
column5: oenngyaa obiara ma ɔaannka: na ɔyɛɛ Makedahen no dɛ mbrɛ ɔyɛɛ Jerikohen no."

column3: nye Israel nyinara twaa mu fi Makeda
column4: kɔr Libna

column3: nye ne hen no
column4: hyɛɛ Israel nsa; na ɔdze afona anomu bɔɔ no
column5: nye akra a wɔwɔ mu nyinara; na oenngyaa obiara ma ɔaannka wɔ mu; na ɔyɛɛ ne hen no so dɛ mbrɛ ɔyɛɛ Jerikohen no."

column3: nye Israel nyinara twaa mu fi Libna
column4: kɔr Lakis

column2: "na EWURADZE yii Lakis hyɛɛ Israel nsa
column3: na Josua gyee no da a otsia ebien no
column4: na ɔdze afona bɔɔ no
column5: nye akra a wɔwɔ mu nyinara
column6: dɛ mbrɛ dza ɔdze yɛɛ Libna no tse nyinara."

column2: "Nna Gezerhen Horam fowee bae bɔboaa Lakis; na Josua kum ɔno nye ne man
column3: dze kodur dɛ oenngyaa no biara ma ɔaannka."
nye Israel nyinara twaa mu fi Lakis

column2: "Na Josua bobɔɔ hɔn fi Kades-barnea araa kodur Gaza
column3: nye Gosen ɔman no nyinara mu
